item.description: The most significant feature coming in iOS 18.2 is ChatGPT Siri integration. What does this mean for your security and privacy?

item.title: Apple iPhone Suffering ‘Scary Bug’ With Data Vanishing—But It’s Fixable
item.description: If you have found all the data in the Notes app on your iPhone vanishing, you’re not alone. Don’t worry, all is not lost.
